long_description: Durable yet cozy, the REI Galicia Soft-Shell jacket combines a luxurious fleece interior with a weather-resistant shell to keep you warm and protected in wet, windy weather. Stretchy soft-shell fabric is water- and snow-repellent, wind resistant up to 30 mph and offers a comfortable range of motion. Plush, high-pile bonded fleece lining moves moisture away from your body and holds in warmth. 3-panel hood has a front drawcord adjustment. Zippered handwarmer pockets; interior storm guard; chin guard; drawcord hem. The REI Galicia Soft-Shell jacket has a regular fit.
short_description: Durable yet cozy, the REI Galicia Soft-Shell jacket combines a luxurious fleece interior with a weather-resistant shell to keep you warm and protected in wet, windy weather.
